website_summaries.verdict: This stylish push-along ride-on toy is decked out with features to please both toddlers and parents. Excellent quality, an appealing appearance, and convenient features for a reasonable price.
pros: Soft, but rugged poly wheels make for a quieter ride on hard surfaces — something any parent can appreciate
Rotating steering wheel with a honking horn delights little drivers
Comes with convenient under-the-hood storage and 2 cup holders
Parent push handle folds for storage and portability
cons: The floorboard isn’t removable for foot-to-floor riding

customer_reviews.title: Components rattling, decrease in quality from earlier model
customer_reviews.text: We had borrowed one of these from a friend and had it for about 3 years but returned it when they had a new kid. It was great! This new one is garbage. My husband who is an aerospace and mechanical engineer by trade who also builds race cars for fun cannot make this thing run smooth. It is loud, rattling and the quality of the plastic cheaper than the original model (which was only made a few years ago). I give it one star because my kids still love it, I just can’t stand pushing it with all the racket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shakes and rattles to the point of being useless
customer_reviews.text: Update , 17 May 2018 - Just called customer service on the issue of rattling and shaking. They told me that the new tires they use shake and rattle and there is nothing he can do about it. He said he will mention it to their quality department and suggested I return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ambitio

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the wheels are white!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with different set of wheels. We received “grey” wheels as opposed to soft white wheels. And they are very rough and noisy. it is so hard to ride this car because of the noise and vibration it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 month old LOVES this car
customer_reviews.text: The package was missing one of the bolts and had 4 extra pieces of hardware. However, once we got it put together, our 8 month old son LOVES it. The age recommendation is 18 months, but our son has been sitting independently since 5 months and started pulling to standing at 7.5 months. He is very stable in this car with the seatbelt secured. Definitely happy we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Not a whisper ride...
customer_reviews.text: Adding whisper ride to the title of this product must have been some kind of sick joke. This thing rattles like it is designed to purposefully be noisy. It also requires lifting either the front or back wheels off the ground to steer since all the wheels are fixed pointing straight.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Get 1st ride for the toddler pre-school age
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these cars for use in the surgery area of my hospital. It's a great way for kids to be distracted from the fact that they can't eat or drink before surgery and makes the separation from family easier for all as they "drive" on back to the OR with staff. I have enjoyed watching the kids driving these cars so much, that I ordered one for my grandson for his 1st birthday. Very sturdy little car that I know will get many years (and miles) of use.
customer_reviews.author: Carolbdahl

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it look cool, but chicks dig it.
customer_reviews.text: After they impounded my vehicle for a DUI, I needed anotherone fast. The handling and maneuverability of this vehicle is absolutely great. I take turns with ease. When I pull up to my favorite bar, I can tell everyone is looking at me with sure envy, because they all be lookin. Update: Apparently this is a DUI proof vehicle!.. Although I did get a drunk in public... I guess you can't win.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: More entertaining than a stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Started using this car for my son around 10 months old. He’s growing into but we buckle him in and he can’t get out (although sometimes he tilts to the side to try to touch the wheel!) It’s a nice substitute for the stroller for casual walks around the neighborhood and it goes over grass, gravel, bumps just fine. He likes reaching to plants and flowers to touch from it, which is sweet. The horn is pretty lousy, but the little yellow cup holder on the handle doubles as a phone holder! (Wouldn’t fit an iPhone pro or something too wide.) We’re definitely getting our money’s worth out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Dubinsky

customer_reviews.title: Your child needs this!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot day enough good things about this little car! My son LOVES this little car! The handle folds down so it is easy to transport! I take it everywhere! It’s so much fun for him to cruise around in this for my dr appointments, shopping, walks, or festivals! The little horn beeps and I love that it has a cup holder! The wheels are nice too and it drives very smoothly! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JoeyZero

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons 2nd birthday this week. He LOVED it. But, only got to use it once! I cannot unscrew the red knob on the back to fold the handle under. It looks like it got stripped after ONE use. I did not force the handle on either. I am so disappointed because now we can’t go anywhere to walk with it because I can’t fit it in my vehicle with the handle up! I want to return it but doubt I will be able to without a box (since it wouldn’t be able to fit!)
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: BEST gift for 1st Birthday ever!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our grandson's first birthday... OMG, he loves it so much. Assembling was average, but our boy is so worth it. He's a climber so even though we're not pushing him every minute of the day (which he wants), he enjoys climbing in and out and pushing it himself. He loves wild and crazy rides around his house and longer jaunts around the neighborhood. It was his favorite gift! I love that it had a seatbelt and the whole ride is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Proud JayHawker

customer_reviews.title: Not quite whisper, but a lot fun
customer_reviews.text: Solid car toy for toddlers and kids. The rubber wheels keep the noise relatively low from their plastic counter part, though I won’t say they are quite low as a whisper. One biggest drawback is getting the car to turn as the front wheel have no rotation in them. Only easier way to turn the car is to lift the front wheels by applying pressure on the push handle and having the car turn just on the two rear wheels. Kiddo likes it a lot. She has fun time playing with the front trunk and stashes all her favorite toys there.
customer_reviews.author: Not Randy Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: This is quieter than the original push around buggy, but it buzzes and rattles far too much to have whisper in the name. The folding handle is a great idea, but the screw that holds it in place buzzes loudly while in use. The cup holder on the handle is too narrow and easily tips over. When it does tip, it pours the beverage directly on your child's head. This is such a great concept, it is just very poorly executed. A collapsible radio flyer wagon can serve a similar purpose, but with more space and an actually quiet ride for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: CTM

customer_reviews.title: Durable and WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My little grandson (11months at the time) LOVES this car!!! He wants to “go side” to ride and drive it! He literally INSPECTED every aspect of this car when it was received. He looked “under the hood”, played with the wheels before assembling and “drove”with the steering wheel! So CUTE!!! It does require assembly and ours came without the wheels or handle attached. The “cup holder” is sized for a small water bottle and this was a somewhat disappointing factor however the FAMILY LOVES this little DURABLE car!!
customer_reviews.author: TxCowgirlRN50

customer_reviews.title: Room to grow, great car
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great little car. My mom got this for my son's first birthday and he absolutely loves it. Lots of leg room so he will be able to use it for several years. The wheels have a layer of rubber over them allowing it to roll smoothly and reduce noise.. We do slide a receiving blanket between him and the lap belt because he tends to slide down a little because his feet dont really touch the floor of the car very well yet. Excellent little car, we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mandu

customer_reviews.title: Rides smooth if you are going straight. Design could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: This car arrived well in time and we did not have to wait for long. The wheels Of the car are a bit flat than inflated which makes the car ride noisy. I haven’t seen anyone pointing out the fact that it is so difficult to turn the Car. The car will give you a smooth ride if you are going straight but it is so difficult to turn it if need be. You have to use your full strength to make a turn. I don’t know if there something wrong with the design in general or specifically with our car.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. We originally had a different push car that had plastic wheels for our toddler. The plastic wheels on the roads and sidewalks was so loud that my wife and I couldn’t hold a conversation. We bought this hoping that the rubber wheels would be quiet enough so we could hear each other. This provided exactly that. Is it completely silent? No, but it WAY better than a car with plastic wheels. We’ve had it for about 4 months now and go on multiple walks per day and it is still holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great little car
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car and the rubber wheels do make it less noisy than our other car that had plastic wheels. My only complaint it that the body of the car came slightly warped, the front left wheel doesn’t touch the ground sometimes. I’m hoping it will eventually flatten out over time. Other than that it’s a great way to get walks in around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Nice car
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this car.. I had no issue with the noise as in other reviews, and maneuvering the car is fine. The top cup holder it tiny can’t even put standard cup or bottle in it, it’s too narrow.. so that’s useless. otherwise baby enjoys his car rides
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson used one at a friends house so of course we needed one for ours! He loves it! Since he also loves to push it I would recommend the mfger consider installing a small crossbar on the push handle at children’s height. Great way to take a child out for a short walk. (He falls asleep in it in longer walks when a stroller would work better)
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: This fun little riding car was the hit of my nephew's first birthday! Assembly was not too bad and totally worth it to see my nephew's smile when he saw his car. He wants to ride and play with his little car all day every day. The little trunk area is great for putting small toys in it and taking them for a ride. This was a wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MSblueMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: It was definitely a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this little car for our grandson's 1st birthday. He is big for his age and was always wanting to sit in his big sister's battery-operated jeep. He loves being outdoors. Now he has his own car and absolutely loves it. And pushing him in it is great exercise for his parents. We would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Transition away from stroller.
customer_reviews.text: This push car is one of the best purchases we’ve made for our son. He is obsessed with it. Our son is 2 years and 5 months old and is on the bigger side. He has ample leg room since this isn’t designs like a “bucket”. He gets in and out on his own and can even buckle himself in. It’s comfortable for my husband and I to maneuver, just wish it was easier to make turns, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cart around. Super durable
customer_reviews.text: Our son was in the hospital, they had one of these to walk kids through the hallways. He loved it so much we had to get one for him. Super durable, roomy, and easy to push. The handle goes down so the car fits easily in the trunk or backseat of the car. Much easier than dealing with a big stroller when going to the zoo or shopping
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Wilder

customer_reviews.title: My LO LOVES this thing and it was super easy to build
customer_reviews.text: My LO LOVES this thing and it was super easy to build. Its light weight and fits in the trunk of my SUV so I take it everywhere versus the stroller. The compartment in the front is where I put wipes and two extra diapers so I don't have to carry a diaper bag. He gets a cup hold and the other holder I use for snacks or my cup. THE ONLY DOWNSIDE is the "parent" cup holder it swings so I can ONLY use it for a bottle of water other size drinks don't fit in it and if they do they tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail G. Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Wheels don't all touch the ground such that it has a substantial imbalance. This is probably due to a warp in the main body. I contacted the company and they wanted give me the run-around before they would resolve the problem. Decided to return to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Luds

customer_reviews.title: Did anyone notice this flaw?
customer_reviews.text: I love this car, but I do have one issue. My son is 15 months old and we took him out in it today for the first time without a jacket since it was warm outside. I noticed a reddish bruise mark on his back afterward the same size as the black piece on the seat. Definitely was rubbing up against him. Will definitely need to put something there next time so this doesn’t happen again. DID ANYONE ELSE NOTICE THIS?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nadel

customer_reviews.title: it is really easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Step2 Whisper Ride. Assembly was not hard, maybe half an hour. It is really quiet. I also have a Radio Flyer Wagon and this ride is quieter on concrete. The wheels do not turn. However, with my 25 pound son in the seat, it is really easy to maneuver. I just raise the front wheels up a hair and turn. With how it is designed, raising the front using the back handle is fairly easy as the child is sitting near the back, therefore, keeping the majority of the weight on the back wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Little_Huskie02012

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 mo old son loves it! My only complaint is how easy the cup holder just falls right out. Though I appreciate the mechanism of keeping the cup straight up it literally just pops right out if you tap it at all. My husband was able to build it pretty quickly. Can’t wait to use it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: this handle removes all pressure from your back & makes time playing with my kids a joy. My 1-yr old son & 3-yr old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, functional, enjoyable. For all parents whose backs have endured years of “Hey Dad... push me! Again!”, this handle removes all pressure from your back & makes time playing with my kids a joy. My 1-yr old son & 3-yr old daughter love it. It’s essy to assemble as well. However, note that a few of the smaller items / parts) a washer & a rod fell inside if other items / parts. So the two “missing” items / parts were indeed included, but I had to “inspect” each item / part to find exactly where it was located. A bit frustrating but worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality, safety belt doesn’t really protect your child, firm seat without back support, so your kid is wobbling when you try to push the car forward. Cheap and noisy wheels, not even close to whisper ride. Hard to articulate, front wheels are settled in permanent position which doesn’t allow to drive the car to the left of right. Missing stickers so your car will look like bare plastic.
customer_reviews.author: ON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 month old. It is absolutely worth the money! It rides good inside or outside. It doesn't make much noise. The strap holds our sweet boy in well, even when he was a little younger than the age it shows this is for. It is very sturdy. Our son loves it and we have spent many hours pushing him in this thing! I would definitely purchase again! It is very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: The first time my grandson sat in the car he pulled the steering wheel off. I took it apart again and redid it and the same thing happened. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: We had another Step 2 car that had no leg room at all. We replaced it with this one and it's awesome. It's easy for the boy (22 months old) to get in and out of and wide enough that he's not falling or stepping out of it while going. It's his favorite riding toy and the handle is a good height for the parent walking behind.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Lots of noise
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are horrible simple things have been installed when packaging. The car makes a lot of noise and that makes you feel like it’s going to break down. Watching other people’s videos it’s normal to make noise but I wouldn’t recommend it. I’m going to be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1 and 1/2 year old boy. He’s a bit tall for his age and his height is almost 39 inches. There’s enough leg room for him, it’s spacious, sturdy and lightweight to carry around. The front for storage is not as big as I thought it would be, can’t put much inside, maybe a pack of wipes and that’s it. Overall it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was 11 months old at the time of purchase. We bought it because he was the Ring Bearer in my middle daughter's wedding, but was not walking at the time. So we decorated the car and he was pushed down the isle in it. It was the cutest thing ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonja L Knight

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are quiet, the storage space in the front for small toys is cute, and the cup holders in the front are great for snacks and a sippy cup. My only few complaints are the handle is a little uncomfortable to push when you go for longer walks. I don't know if it's the width, angle, or height of the handle, but after a while hurts my upper arm/bicep/tricep region. Also, the cup holder for the adult ONLY fits a plastic water bottle. Not a coffee travel mug, not a soft drink bottle, not even your own water bottle (mine is glass). It's inconvenient. Other than that our son loves to ride in it and give other kids rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Whisper  ride for 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to unit from 3 years ago it’s absolutely quite when rolled down the numbing sidewalks of Chicago neighborhoods. My 2 year old grandson loves way better than his stroller. Easy directions and a breeze to assemble. Took about 30 mins from start to finish. Good value if you enjoy taking your little one for a walk. Easy to push and turn. Better maneuverability than his expensive stroller. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Z2K

customer_reviews.title: Missing important parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car for my son's first birthday. We put it together last night and we're missing the steering wheel and cup holder for the handle. There were several pieces of hardware rolling around inside the box as well. The seatbelt is installed backwards and the car rattles terribly when pushed. I called Amazon and they are sending a replacement. I'll update this review once we receive the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Farris

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things that we purchased for my son. He has been using it since about 9 months old (we drive him around in it in our basement when we are snowed in). Recently, we used it as a stroller at an indoor arcade, and it was a lifesaver. The only thing I wish was different is that the wheel are fixed (in other words, it doesn't turn).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great addition because they prefer to ride in this than ...
customer_reviews.text: We have the older version. This has been a great addition because they prefer to ride in this than a stroller so it makes family walks more enjoyable for everyone! I really like that this one the handle folds down so it can easily fit in the back of my van and be used at the zoo etc. It has two cup holders for child and one for the adult--well thought out! We began using with our youngest at 8 months and I expect to get 1-2 years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Defective part and black marks on top back of seat
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get this for my grandson's birthday but it came with black scuff marks on top of the seatback, plus small scratch in plastic. Could not get black marks off. Also, the red knob that holds the handle tight was cross-threaded and would not screw tight into seat back, so it's loose and wobbly. Contacted Step 2 to see if they can send me another red knob and to let them know it was scuffed in the most visible spot. I always purchase Step 2 products because they are usually well built and sturdy, so slightly disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rom Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it but I hate the cupholders on it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves car. My only real issue is with the cup holders. The ones on the front are not shallow enough to hold a sippy cup. We've lost so many sippy cups on walks with my son. We don't even hear them fall out. When you hit a bump or go over a surface that's not totally smooth, the cups will fly out. The cup holder on the handle is also very flimsy and doesn't hold much. It doesn't fit a Starbucks cup of any size. I had to use gorilla tape to make sure the cupholder doesn't swivel and the contents inside don't hit my son. It could've been designed better.
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Great toy / stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great toy / stroller! We have the version with the silver wheels and it rolls just fine with no rattle. My only complaint is that the cup holder was a pain to secure and the seatbelt was a pain too but it works as it should and we are really happy with this. Have used it many times for walks.
customer_reviews.author: MegsLacey

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this car
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this car. Seriously, it's amazing. I've gotten SO many compliments on it and my 2yr old loves it. He hates riding in carts but he'll ride in this all day. He even likes to occasionally sit in it and eat his lunch! The little trunk in the front is perfect for storing a few of toys. It works great on all surfaces (recently took it on a walk with no paved roads and it did great). The only com I can think of is the cup holder is basically useless. Everyone I've tried to use it, it'll flip the drink. Also which there was a place to put my keys or cellphone but those are small complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, cup w/ handle not fit
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Good for mall or just take a walk in community. Got a lot of compliments. One year old baby loves it so much wants to jump in and go out every time sees it! Easy to unscrew the red button for folding handle and put in trunk. Cons: the baby’s cup with handle can not fit in :(. Will have to hold or put in front trunk... wish a upgrade design here!
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of leg room
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this this. It went together pretty easy only took me like ten minutes. The leg room is great. A lot of these say there’s no leg room that’s why I got this one. It’s pretty quiet so far. We haven’t had it long so we will see how it holds up but so far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Goldate

customer_reviews.title: Much Quieter than the Original!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car and it is a lot quieter than the original! I just wish that the handle was a little longer and it does pull to one side a little. All-in-all very nice product and a thousand times better than the one with loud plastic wheels!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I got this! Its worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old just loooooves this car. It's so much fun and she can put her treasures in the hood compartment. She laughs and giggles every time she opens the lid to her prized possessions out. I love all the cup holders!! One for me two for baby!
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn M

customer_reviews.title: Whisper ride II should change the name to jackhammer ride II
customer_reviews.text: Overall the looks good and seems good quality for the price. The reason for 2 stars is when you push it there is a significant vibration and loud sound to go with it. It is not an intended sound as it feels like a jackhammer and everything is going to fall apart when in motion. If this is the whisper ride II I would hate to hear what the first one sounded like. I would not buy this again or recommend this to someone due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud.  Vibrates the entire ride
customer_reviews.text: We put this car together following the instructions perfectly. We took our one year old for the first ride on it in the street and it is SO loud. The entire axle feels like it is vibrating and the whole car including the little steering wheel vibrates. We thought it might be a defect with that car so we returned it and got a replacement. EXACT same thing happened. I am so mad. For $75 you would expect an item that doesn’t have huge defects such as this. We missed our narrow return window so now we are stuck with a loud car that vibrates the entire walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, well-made, and fun
customer_reviews.text: This little car is so adorable and our grandson thinks he’s a big boy when he rides in it. The seatbelt adjusted perfectly to his size and there’s even room for a doll or stuffed animal to ride with them
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: No Stickers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new push car! It’s very cute, easy to push, and has a cute storage area under the hood. The only downside is that it didn’t come with any stickers to decorate the car. There are spots for stickers for the lights and grill but no actual stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Sugarman

customer_reviews.title: QUIET
customer_reviews.text: If you're interested in one of these get the Whisper Ride simply because it's QUIET. My friend has one she brought with us to the zoo-- it was so loud on the pavement we couldn't hear each other talk. I wanted one for my 1 year old and was sure to research if there were quieter options and boom there is-- this!! Get this if you want to hear others or just hear yourself think.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsFalconinLA

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this even after reading some of the one star reviews. I absolutely love this they must’ve change the wheels because it is quiet it is not loud at all. My grandson is having a blast with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granny’s Gift was perfect!😍
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for our 1 year old grandson. He started getting fussy and was about to fall asleep before opening his gifts. Grandpa strolled up with this and everything changed. He loved it! * P.S. We brought it to the party assembled, which took about about an hour. Grandpa’s input: The handle locking mechanism was a little wonky. Could use some improvement. Overall, a sturdy little whip.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. Plan to use while camping so I don’t have to carry him around campground!
customer_reviews.text: Directions were okay. Not all the screws were included. Some pieces not level and warped like the hood and the body because only three wheels touch at a time. The wheels were a big concern when reading reviews mine came with the grey wheels they aren’t all rubber they are just sprayed with a rubber coat! But not too bad for noise level!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, fast shipping from seller.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my toddler. I got the cheapest shipping option and it still arrived in two days! The product is great. My 21 month old had been getting us to push him non-stop around the house. It took me and my 8 year old about 40 minutes to put together. About 15 of these minutes included us trying to figure out where parts T and U were - they were attached to the car already. It's been hours of entertainment so far and is a super durable toy. I hope he likes it just as much outside so I can go for walks this summer with him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the car and when I went to put the 7"x 3/16" bolt in it there was none to be found, bolt ,nut , washer nothing ! Of course it was as simple as going to the hardware store and picking one up !
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but didn't hold up for 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: The pictures to put this together were pretty fuzzy. The screw that keeps the handle in the up position came loose and couldn't be screwed back in - in less than 24 hours. My husband had to run wire around the handle to keep it upright. We only use it when he comes to visit, but was definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Milli

customer_reviews.title: Great first car for my boy!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price! My son really loved it, while he could fit behind the wheel. We like taking long walks and this car has really been a saver, because my son would not stay in the stroller, but having a sterring wheel finally kept him seated for more than half-hour. The wheels are pretty big and can handle fairly deep sand, high grass and steep hills. The best thing that it's easily transportable because the handle unscrews and folds right under the car itself making it easy to fit inside a small sedan's trunk. The storage compartment could be bigger but it's big enough to fit couple of kids' water bottles or a small umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rattling, shaking, and vibration
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, but as others have described, it rattles and shakes, and the vibration is so loud when we see pushing it! Can't push it for too long or my arms will get numb. If I had known it was this bad, wouldn't have purchased it..
customer_reviews.author: Plumeria Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit hard to assemble do to the screw holes not in the right positions but i got there and overall it is very cute and sturdy and safe. Just takes time to assemble but it is a very good car for your little one it arrived earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Mirelys Aponte

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT  PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST purchase as a grandpa I have ever made. Since my 10 month old grandson didn't like the stroller I thought I would try this great little car. Most EXCELLENT decision !!! He is now 2 years old and still loves to ride in it. It is so light weight that even he now likes to push it on our walks around the park. It is very easy to steer and the front storage compartment has ample space. People passing by always smile or comment on how cute he looks in his blue car. Very pleased with the quality. Highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Sporty Little Coupe
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little coupe. We bought it for my granddaughter's 1st birthday and she loves it! She can beep the horn and loves opening and closing the front trunk.
customer_reviews.author: HRB

customer_reviews.title: Other kids will want to steal this!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son has all the little neighborhood girls fighting over him and wanting rides in his car. We go everywhere with this awesome little car! Thank you so much. It was a little difficult to assemble but it is so worth it. It is very sturdy, and I can even run with it-no problem! My son loves it and everyone is always saying how cute it is. Sometimes kids scream because they want to take it. Best Amazon purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car and so does my 1 year old. Everyday/a couple times a day we ride this bad boy down the street for our walks. He loves it. The horn works well and he acts like he is driving down the street. The handle to push the car is at perfect location and the cup holder allows me to put my water there. The car has a hood and my baby puts his other toys in there while we walk. Best Gift EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great little car. Purchased for my 7 month old and we use it daily. I like it more than the stroller as it's just one strap instead of a shoulder straps, seatbelts, velcro, etc. We use it daily to walk to daycare, walk around town, and we even bring it into stores. He has a good time in it and it always gets a great reaction from other folks. The lack of shade was remedied by purchasing an articulating umbrella (versa-brella) and it's a nice setup. It's easy to put together, although the directions aren't super clear with the illustrations. All in all a great purchase that we will get a lot of (literal) mileage from.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and our toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our kid loves it, will watch TV in it, and will let us push her around a little bit in it outside (when she needs a little break from running everywhere). She does try to climb up the back on occasion, which can make the car want to essentially do a wheelie, so it's something to watch out for.
customer_reviews.author: Mahler

customer_reviews.title: My 1yr old Nephew LOVES it 💙
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephews 1st birthday - it has wonderful safety features as well as items that make it a comfy journey for the Parents as well - my sister loves to be active and spend time outdoors so I wanted to get this for my lil Buggy as I knew he would love it! They said it was easy to assemble - I personally love the safety strap (yep the paranoid Aunt!) As long as my Nephew is happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: LilyTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Came with scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered fast sooner then expected. Also came with scuff marks and something black on the side little upset since I paid decent money for this. Putting together for me was a little challenging but I'm terrible at putting things together I'm sure it will be no problem for my husband to throw together. My little one is 14 months fits just fine with growing room he's very excited for it to be put together. Over great besides coming with damage marks.
customer_reviews.author: tabatha

customer_reviews.title: my kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. kid loves it. base expectations met so we're happy with it. what could be better? * maybe if the steering wheel actually turned the front wheels. not like my kid can go anywhere w/o me pushing unless it's on an incline. * an easier way to steer the ride from the back. it's almost as if you're skiing, you put pressure on one side to turn the car. if your kid is a big one, it'll harder to turn this thing. * wish the cup holder on the handle in the back is larger. it seems more like a soda-can type but the cup-holders in the front by the steering wheel are much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Putt Putt

customer_reviews.title: It's a quiet ride!
customer_reviews.text: This car is hands down the best! When I was purchasing it, I didn't know why it was called whisper rider... And now I do! Because it's actually quiet when you're pushing it! Our neighbors have the other version, but it is so loud that you have to almost yell when you're talking, while pushing that one. But this one, the whisper rider, you can talk normal and be just fine! It's a quiet, smooth ride and it comes with 3 cup holders! If you're in the market for a car like this, I would recommend the whisper rider! The fact that's it's quiet makes it definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun.... Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This car was well received by our Grandson. He has had many hours of fun with it even when Mom or Dad, Grandma or Grandpa are not pushing him around in it. He likes the secret seat compartment to hide his toys in. He has had hours of pretending he is driving. Nice toy and worth the price. Good service...Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: Cute little car
customer_reviews.text: This car is the best! Fairly easy to assemble. We live in Minnesota and I used this in the ice/slush/mud now that the weather is getting warmer. It pushed quite easily through the slush and mud. I only with the cup holder was larger! (Picture is from summer)
customer_reviews.author: Allison Breyfogle

customer_reviews.title: the buggy seems safe and sturdy. Also
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my one-year-old nephew, and he loves it! Set-up took about an hour and was straight forward for the most part. A few things to note: - The steering wheel does not turn the wheels - The wheels do not rotate or turn. - The cupholder is too small for a regular-sized beverage (Starbucks, beer, etc.) I expected a bit more out of a $60+ plastic buggy. On the plus side, the buggy seems safe and sturdy. Also, as I mentioned, my nephew loves it when we go on walks.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact there are cup holders for the kid ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this push car. I love the fact there are cup holders for the kid and for the adult. Installation was a breeze. The people who were complaining about the missing bolt made me worried but I realized that the missing bolt is actually there in place so you have to remove it to install the handle.
customer_reviews.author: mikeju

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son when he was 7 months. He is 10 months old now and is obsessed with his car. He LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: What a great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great investment! My 20 months old boy love this!! We use this to "drive" him around the neighborhood, beach (instead of push is pull on the sand) and park. He absolutely love this! He actually use the cup holder for his drink and it feel like he's driving! It's just absolutely adorable. One thing I would love to see is that the front wheel can turn because during a turn it's a bit tough especially with a baby on it. Overall: I say a great investment...my wife used to carry our son all the time now he just hop on and we roll out!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Your baby's first car.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 13 month old. He loves it and prefers to sit in it during the day. It was easy to assemble and can be done by one person. I love that the handle can tuck underneath the car for easy transport. We've taken it to the park and it fit in a Ford Fusion trunk with no problem. The seat belt came in handy; it kept my son safely inside the car but didn't restrict his movement. Consider this for warm weather fun!
customer_reviews.author: DrCiCi

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! There is assembly required but it's a quiet, smooth ride, and my 10mo old is fully enjoying it. We have had it for about 1-2 months now and loving it. Reviews are right about the top adult cup holder tipping over easily. Ask me how I know :-/ but other than that design flaw, it's an awesome little ride on for ur little one and will last for a long time with high weight limit. We ordered the sport umbrella like another reviewer posted and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little car!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old for Christmas and he is OBSESSED! Beat purchase I have made in a long time and he will be able to use this for a while! Very well made and fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelD12

customer_reviews.title: Worth the assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to assemble, but my child LOVES it! I use it mostly for walks around the neighborhood. It's pretty easy to push on the sidewalk. It has a little space under the hood where I'll store my phone and house key during our walk. She liked to push the little horn. She's a very tall 20 months and should be able to fit comfortably in the car for at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: JoDB

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the Whisper Ride II Ride On Push Car
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Whisper Ride that we have bought. The first one was for our 2 year old grandson. He loves it and asks his parents to take him out so he can ride in it on a regular basis. Then, we bought another one for our 10 month old grandson. He loves it , too. They are well made and sturdy. Our neighbor has one for their 2 1/2 year old. They take him for a walk in it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best push car, ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for our grandson who turned one. Great, great little push car. Best leg room than any others, and super convenient storage.
customer_reviews.author: janet silva

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Husband easily installed it, my eight month old son loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Nice little compartment in the front to put snacks and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car! Our walks are so much more peaceful now that he has something to drive! Nice little compartment in the front to put snacks and toys for when he gets grumpy! Didn't realize the front wheels do not turn. Makes it very hard to maneuver around without scratching up the wheels. Also, the bottom doesn't come out so they can push themselves when they get older. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beets

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday present for my son's one year. We've had it for two months now. He LOVES it! We walk around our neighborhood and to the local store with him riding along. He is a pretty active kid, but he will sit behaved riding in his 'buggy'. Most of the people we pass will make comments about how cute or cool his car is. Easy to assemble. Pretty durable so far (2 months). It is pretty quiet and easy to move about. Highly recommend. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Eman Sanatkar

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson loves this car!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson immediately sat in the car even before we put it together. He is almost 2 and really loved the features on it, opened the snack area immediately, he wanted to put it together right away. Perfect size for him too. A good price for a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Evelynmarieg

customer_reviews.title: great little car and babies / toddlers love this
customer_reviews.text: STILL in use and works perfectly after 6 months. This is easy to bring in car by removing the handle. I love this car, it is super cute, and my 1.5 grandson has a blast now that he can honk the horn. LOVES to go for walks. It has a seat belt so he cannot escape.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: In accurate product description on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product description indicates it has folding seats but turn into a table and eating area. This is not true. The seat is just of stationary bench seat. So, there isn't enough difference between this and the cheaper red version. I wouldn't spend the $20. Had I known, I would've bought the original version. It being quieter is only marginal and not enough incentive
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: this car is a tank
customer_reviews.text: my son got this over a year ago, and it is still in great shape. this car has gone on many walks and traveled many miles. amazing to get your kids into cars
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vella

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Just what I wanted. Grand baby loved it at Christmas and we were able to take a walk on a warm day here in Kentucky soon after it arrived. Great size for him , 2 yrs old, with enough room to grow and use for a few summers.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves this car!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this car! Very easy to assemble and a much better price than the original red and yellow push car. I also really like the fact that you can fold the handle down so it’s much easier to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson’s favorite mode of transportation
customer_reviews.text: Grandson immediate got in his new car and loved it! He loves putting things in the storage compartment. He loves putting his drink cups in the cup holders. He really loves being able to turn the steering wheel like he’s driving.
customer_reviews.author: ASArizona

customer_reviews.title: Is roomy
customer_reviews.text: Is great . Roomy . U must put a cushion or towel to cover the sitting area . The plastic will hurt the little rider's back. I suggest the high chair cushion . If u still have it
customer_reviews.author: Lovelywoman482

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new car :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 month old son and he loves it! My son is a bit bigger than average, measures in the 99 percentile in weight and height and still has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Tapia

customer_reviews.title: but it is still easy to push across twig-strewn lawns
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo much quieter than the plastic wheeled alternatives. This is a roomy ride for our toddler, and he loves to be able to put things in the convenient cup holders. It seems to have a bit less ground clearance than the other blue plastic kiddy car that it has replaced at our house, but it is still easy to push across twig-strewn lawns. The cup holder for daddy could be a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this car and I would take him on walks in it everyday. You have to build it yourself but it’s honestly not difficult to do. It also doesn’t take up too much space
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

product_meta.title: Step2 Whisper Ride II Ride On Push Car, Blue
product_meta.description:
Take this stylish kids’ toy push car out for a stroll with your little one! They’ll have a blast in the Step2 Whisper Ride II pretending to drive their very own supercar with the movable steering wheel and realistic horn. Buckle up with the included seat belt, pack some snacks in the under-hood storage, and use the cup holders for drinks. This ride-on car features Whisper Wheels for reduced road noise, along with an easy-fold handle for effortless transportation and storage wherever the next adventure leads. Redesigned from our classic Whisper Ride Cruiser model, the Whisper Ride II has a larger interior so toddlers can travel in style and comfort. Made in USA of US and imported parts.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Step2 Whisper Ride II Buggy – Blue is an updated, roomier version of one of Step2's best sellers. This cute little machine features a sleek automotive design with soft poly wheels to help provide a smooth, quiet ride. It also features storage under the hood, as well as a handle that can be folded underneath the body to help simplify transport and storage.
feature_bullets: A toddler push car with a sleek automotive design, smooth quiet ride wheels, and a kid powered car horn
Ride on features two cup holders for the child and one for parents.Maximum weight on ride-on- 50 Pounds. (22.7 kg)
Car features an easy to fold handle for easy storage and quick transportation.
Safety belt included to keep toddlers secure inside the car
Spacious storage located under the car's hood for transportation of little treasures
Features "whisper ride" wheels for smooth, quiet ride and easy-pull handle design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,891 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
